Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「編成」！
Quest.TR-Name: A1: First Formation
Quest.JP-Detail: ２隻以上の艦で構成される「艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A2: Form a Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 駆逐艦４隻以上で構成される「駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A3: Form a Torpedo Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡洋艦を旗艦とし、数隻の駆逐艦で構成される「水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a CL as a flagship and 3-5 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: ６隻編成の艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A4: Form a Six Ship Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 全6隻で構成される主力艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 6 ships in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 軽巡２隻を擁する隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A5: Form a Squadron with two CL
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡洋艦２隻を擁する高速艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「重巡戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A7: Form a Heavy Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 重巡洋艦２隻を擁する重巡艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 CA in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「空母機動部隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A12: Form a Carrier Task Force
Quest.JP-Detail: 空母1隻以上を旗艦とし、その護衛艦艇と共に、空母機動部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a CV/CVL as a flagship and 3 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「天龍」型軽巡姉妹の全２艦を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A8: Form a Tenryuu-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 天龍型軽巡洋艦「天龍」「龍田」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Tenryuu (天龍) and Tatsuta (龍田) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「川内」型軽巡姉妹の全３艦を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A14: Form a Sendai-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 川内型軽巡洋艦「川内」「神通」「那珂」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Sendai (川内), Jintsuu (神通) and Naka (那珂) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「妙高」型重巡姉妹の全４隻を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A15: Form a Myoukou-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 妙高型重巡洋艦「妙高」「那智」「足柄」「羽黒」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄) and Haguro (羽黒) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「扶桑」型戦艦姉妹の全２隻を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A17: Form a Fusou-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 扶桑型戦艦「扶桑」「山城」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Fusou (扶桑) and Yamashiro (山城) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「伊勢」型戦艦姉妹の全２隻を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A18: Form an Ise-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 伊勢型戦艦「伊勢」「日向」を同一艦隊に配属せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Ise (伊勢) and Hyuuga (日向) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 戦艦と重巡による主力艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A13: Form a Main Fleet using BB and CA
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦1隻以上、重巡2隻以上を主力とした水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count) and 2 CA in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「南雲機動部隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A19: Form the Nagumo Task Force
Quest.JP-Detail: 一航戦「赤城」「加賀」二航戦「飛龍」「蒼龍」からなる第一機動部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Akagi (赤城), Kaga (加賀), Hiryuu (飛龍) and Souryuu (蒼龍) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 第２艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A6: Form a Second Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 二つ目の艦隊、第２艦隊の旗艦を指定して、第２艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a flagship in your second fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水上機母艦」を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A9: Deploy a Seaplane Tender
Quest.JP-Detail: 多数の水上偵察機を運用する「水上機母艦」を艦隊に配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have an AV in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 第２艦隊で空母機動部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A11: Form a Carrier Task Force in the Second Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 第２艦隊に空母を配備して、空母機動部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a CV/CVL and 3 DD in your second fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「金剛」型による高速戦艦部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A16: Form a Kongou-class Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 金剛型戦艦「金剛」「比叡」「榛名」「霧島」全４隻の高速戦艦を集中配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kongou (金剛), Hiei (比叡), Haruna (榛名) and Kirishima (霧島) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A20: Form the Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「鳥海」「青葉」「加古」「古鷹」「天龍」を含む高速艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) and a FAST speed ship in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A10: Form the 6th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」4隻による第六駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (雷) and Ikazuchi (電) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第四戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A21: Form the 4th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「愛宕」「高雄」「鳥海」「摩耶」を基幹とした第四戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海) and Maya (摩耶) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A22: Form the Nishimura Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とした西村艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上) and Shigure (時雨) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A23: Form the 5th Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とし、駆逐艦2隻を加えた第五航空戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A24: Form the New Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「鳥海」「青葉」「衣笠」「加古」「古鷹」「天龍」からなる三川艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A25: Form a Submarine Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 SS/SSV in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 航空水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A26: Form a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦2隻と航空巡洋艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 中規模潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A27: Form a Medium-Sized Submarine Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 伊号潜水艦3隻以上からなる潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 3 SS/SSV in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A28: Form the 6th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「古鷹」「加古」「青葉」「衣笠」を基幹とした第六戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉) and Kinugasa (衣笠) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A29: Form the 5th Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「那智」「足柄」「多摩」「木曾」を中核とした「第五艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄), Tama (多摩) and Kiso (木曾) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A30: Form the 1st Torpedo Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 「阿武隈」「曙」「潮」「霞」「不知火」を中核とした「第一水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Abukuma (阿武隈), Akebono (曙), Ushio (潮), Kasumi (霞) and Shiranui (不知火) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A31: Form the 8th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「朝潮」「満潮」「大潮」「荒潮」4隻による第八駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮) and Arashio (荒潮) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A32: Form the 18th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「霞」「霰」「陽炎」「不知火」4隻による第十八駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎) and Shiranui (不知火) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A33: Form the 30th Destroyer Division (Gen.1)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「睦月」「如月」「弥生」「望月」4隻による第三十駆逐隊(第一次)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生) and Mochizuki (望月) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 式の準備！(その参)
Quest.TR-Name: WA01: In Preparation of Love (Part 3)
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊旗艦に練度の高い(Lv.90以上～99以下)艦娘を配備して気持ちを整理せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Organize your feelings and deploy your fleet with a high level flagship (Lv.90~99)!

Quest.JP-Name: 新たなる旅立ち！
Quest.TR-Name: WA02: Journey Anew
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊旗艦に強い絆を結んだLv.100以上の艦娘を配備した6隻の艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Organize a fleet of 6 ships with your newly bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship!

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A34: Form the 30th Destroyer Division (Gen.2)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「睦月」「弥生」「卯月」「望月」4隻による第三十駆逐隊(第二次)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A35: Form the 5th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「妙高」「那智」「羽黒」を基幹とした第五戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A36: Form the New 2nd Carrier Division!
Quest.JP-Detail: 「飛龍改二」(※旗艦)及び「蒼龍」を基幹とした二航戦(要駆逐艦2隻)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A37: Form the 6th Submarine Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「潜水母艦」と複数の潜水艦(4隻以上)からなる潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have an AS as flagship and 4 (or more) SS/SSV in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新型電探を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A38: Test the New RADAR
Quest.JP-Detail: 新型電探運用試験のため、第一艦隊の旗艦に「妙高改二」を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Myoukou Kai2 (妙高改二) as the flagship of your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 再編成「第二航空戦隊」を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A39: Strengthen the Reorganized 2nd Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「蒼龍改二」(※旗艦)及び「飛龍改二」を基幹とした二航戦(要駆逐艦2隻)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Souryuu Kai2 (蒼龍改二) as flagship, Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第三戦隊」全艦集結せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A40: Form the Elite 3rd Battleship Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 第二次改装を完了した改装金剛型高速戦艦4隻を集結させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have all four Kongou-class Kai2 battleships in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「新型正規空母」を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A41: Deploy a New Standard Aircraft Carrier
Quest.JP-Detail: 雲龍型航空母艦一番艦「雲龍」を第一艦隊機旗艦に配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Unryuu (雲龍) as your flagship.

Quest.JP-Name: 主力戦艦部隊「第二戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A42: Form the Main Battleship Fleet: the 2nd Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 長門型2隻及び扶桑型2隻の計4隻の主力戦艦からなる第二戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have both Nagato-class and both Fusou-class battleships (and no other ships) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 戦艦を主力とした水上打撃部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A43: Form the Surface Strike Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 大和型・長門型・伊勢型・扶桑型のいずれか3隻と軽巡1隻他の水上打撃部隊を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 3 battleships of Nagato, Fusou, Ise or Yamato classes and a CL in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 改修工廠を準備せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A45: Prepare the Arsenal for Renovations
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊の旗艦に工作艦「明石」を配備、改修工廠の準備を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Akashi (明石) as your flagship in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A44: Form the Reorganised Nishimura Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」「満潮」を基幹とした西村艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 軽快な「水上反撃部隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A46: Form a Counterattack Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 駆逐艦「霞」を旗艦とした重巡「足柄」及び軽巡1隻駆逐艦4隻の水上挺身部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), 1 CL and 3 more DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十一駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A47: Form the 11th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 特I型駆逐艦「吹雪」「白雪」「初雪」「叢雲」4隻による第十一駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo (叢雲) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二一駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A48: Form the 21st Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「初春」「子日」「若葉」「初霜」4隻による第二一駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二二駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A49: Form the 22nd Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「皐月」「文月」「長月」他1隻計駆逐艦4隻による第二二駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月) and 1 more DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「三川艦隊」を新編、突入準備せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A50: Form the New Edition of the Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊において、「鳥海改ニ」を旗艦とする「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Choukai Kai2 (鳥海改ニ) as the flagship and any 5 of Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍), Yuubari (夕張) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十八戦隊」を新編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A51: Form the 18th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡洋艦「天龍」「龍田」を基幹戦力とした「第十八戦隊」を4隻以上で新編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Tenryuu (天龍), Tatsuta (龍田) and 2 or more other ships in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A52: Form the Maritime Assault Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦「比叡」「霧島」軽巡「長良」駆逐艦「暁」「雷」「電」による海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Hiei (比叡), Kirishima (霧島), Nagara (長良), Akatsuki (暁), Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A53: Form the New 6th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「暁改二」を旗艦とした「響」「雷」「電」4隻による第六駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Akatsuki Kai2 as the flagship, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方突入準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A54: Prepare the 1st Torpedo Squadron for the Deployment to the Northern Sea
Quest.JP-Detail: 「阿武隈」を旗艦として「響」「初霜」「若葉」「五月雨」「島風」による一水戦を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Abukuma (阿武隈) as the flagship, Hibiki, Hatsushimo (初霜), Wakaba (若葉), Samidare (五月雨) and Shimakaze (島風) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方再突入準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A55: Prepare the 1st Torpedo Squadron for Another Sortie to the Northern Sea
Quest.JP-Detail: 「阿武隈改二」を旗艦として「響」「夕雲」「長波」「秋雲」「島風」の一水戦を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Abukuma Kai2 (阿武隈改二) as the flagship, Hibiki, Yuugumo (夕雲), Naganami (長波), Akigumo (秋雲) and Shimakaze (島風) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A56: Reorganise the 5th Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」と随伴駆逐艦「朧」「秋雲」を基幹とした第五航空戦隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴), Oboro (朧) and Akigumo (秋雲) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二一戦隊」出撃準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A57: Prepare the New 21st Cruiser Division for Sortie
Quest.JP-Detail: 「那智改二」「足柄改二」及び「多摩」「木曾」を基幹とした、第二一戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Nachi Kai2 (那智改二), Ashigara Kai2 (足柄改二), Tama (多摩) and Kiso (木曾) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A58: Organise the 16th Squadron (1st Gen.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「足柄」を旗艦として「球磨」「長良」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第一次)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Ashigara (足柄) as the flagship, Kuma (球磨) and Nagara (長良) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A59: Organise the 3rd Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「瑞鶴改」を旗艦とし、「瑞鳳」「千歳」「千代田」を加えた4隻の空母部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship and aircraft carriers Zuihou (瑞鳳), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第四航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A60: Organise the 4th Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦「伊勢改」及び「日向改」を基幹戦力とした第四航空戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Ise Kai (伊勢改) and Hyuuga Kai (日向改) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「小沢艦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A61: Organise the Ozawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「瑞鶴改」旗艦、空母「瑞鳳改」「千歳」「千代田」及び「伊勢改」「日向改」を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, aircraft carriers Zuihou Kai (瑞鳳改), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田), and aviation battleships Ise Kai (伊勢改) and Hyuuga Kai (伊勢改) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A62: Organise the New Carrier Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 改二改装を終えた翔鶴型航空母艦2隻と同護衛艦による新航空戦隊を新編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Shoukaku Kai2 (翔鶴改二) and Zuikaku Kai2 (瑞鶴改) along with 2 destroyers as their escort in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A63: Organise the 16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「名取」を旗艦として「五十鈴」「鬼怒」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第二次)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Natori (名取) as the flagship, Isuzu (五十鈴) and Kinu (鬼怒) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「新編成航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A64: Organize the New Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 空母2隻+航空戦艦/航空巡洋艦2隻+駆逐艦2隻の新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 fleet carriers, 2 aviation battleships or aviation cruisers and 2 destroyers in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A65: Strengthen the Surface Counterattack Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 駆逐艦「霞」旗艦、「足柄」「大淀」「朝霜」「清霜」他の水上反撃部隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), Ooyodo (大淀), Asashimo (朝霜) and Kiyoshimo (清霜) in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十一戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A66: Organise the 31st Squadron (1st Gen.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「五十鈴改二」旗艦、「皐月改二」「卯月改」を含む、対潜機動水上部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Isuzu Kai2 (五十鈴改二) as the flagship, Satsuki Kai2 (皐月改二) and Uzuki Kai (卯月改) in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二七駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A67: Organize the 27th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「白露改」旗艦、「時雨」「春雨」「五月雨」4隻による第二七駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Shiratsuyu Kai (as flagship), Shigure, Harusame and Samidare in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A68: Organize the High-speed Transport Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「川内改二」旗艦、「江風改二」「時雨改二」他駆逐2隻による水雷戦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Sendai Kai2 as flagship, Kawakaze Kai2, Shigure Kai2, and two other destroyers in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A69: Organise a New Torpedo Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡級を旗艦とした駆逐艦4隻からなる強力な水雷戦隊を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a CL as flagship and 4 DD in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A70: Reorganise the New 8th Destroyer Division!
Quest.JP-Detail: 「朝潮改二」を旗艦とした「満潮」「大潮」「荒潮」4隻による第八駆逐隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Asashio Kai2/D as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭！八駆第一小隊！
Quest.TR-Name: A71: Elite! 8th Destroyer Division, 1st platoon!
Quest.JP-Detail: 「朝潮改二丁」及び「大潮改二」を含む艦隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Asashio Kai2 D and Ooshio Kai2 in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十九駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A72: Organize the 19th Destroyer Division!
Quest.JP-Detail: 特型駆逐艦「磯波」「浦波」「綾波」「敷波」4隻による第十九駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami, Shikinami in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A73: Organize the 16th Squadron (3rd Gen.)!
Quest.JP-Detail: 「鬼怒」「青葉」「北上」「大井」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第三次)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, and Ooi in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A74: Organize the "Elite 16th Squadron"!
Quest.JP-Detail:
「鬼怒改二」を旗艦として、「北上改二」「大井改二」「球磨改」及び
「青葉改」「浦波改」「敷波改」から5隻、計6隻の精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kinu Kai2 as flagship and 5 of the following: Kitakami Kai2, Ooi Kai2, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai, or Shikinami Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第一戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A75: Organize the New First Squadron!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊に新改装された長門型戦艦一番艦「長門改二」及び同二番艦「陸奥改」からなる
新編第一戦隊を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Nagato Kai Ni as flagship and Mutsu Kai in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第七戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A76: Organize the new 7th Squadron!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に新改装された改鈴谷型「熊野改二」、同二番艦に「鈴谷改二」、
僚艦に「最上改」「三隈改」を配した新編第七戦隊を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kumano Kai Ni as flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni as second ship, Mogami Kai and Mikuma Kai in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A77: Reorganize the Elite 4th Carrier Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦及び同二番艦に練度50以上の航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向」を配備、
随伴艦に軽巡洋艦1隻、駆逐艦2隻他を伴う精鋭「第四航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Ise and Hyuuga as flagship and second ship (both lv50+), 1CL, 2DD, and 1 additional ship in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第四水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A78: Organize the new 4th Torpedo Squadron!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に「由良改二」を配備、随伴艦に二駆「村雨」「夕立」「春雨」「五月雨」
他1隻の駆逐艦を配備、新編「第四水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Yura Kai Ni as flagship, Murasame, Yuudachi, Harusame, Samidare, and 1 additional DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A79: Reorganize the Elite 22th Destroyer Squadron!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：「文月改二」「皐月改二」「水無月改」「長月改」の精強駆逐艦4隻の編成による
精鋭第二二駆逐隊を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Minazuki Kai and Nagatsuki Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精強「任務部隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A80: Organize a Powerful Task Force!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に「Saratoga Mk.II」または同「Mod.2」を配備、随伴艦に
軽巡洋艦1隻、駆逐艦2隻以上を配した夜間作戦可能な機動部隊を新編せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Saratoga Mk.II/Mod.2 as flagship with 1 CL and 2 DD in your main fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A81: Organize the Supreme 8th Destroyer Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：「朝潮改二」「大潮改二」「荒潮改二」「満潮改二」の
最精鋭朝潮型駆逐艦4隻による新編「第八駆逐隊」の編成を完了せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Arashio Kai Ni, Asashio Kai Ni/D, Michishio Kai Ni, and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」第二戦隊随伴部隊、集結せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A82: Form the Escorts of Nishimura 2nd Battleship Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
捷一号作戦準備任務：第一遊撃部隊第三部隊の中核となる第二戦隊の随伴艦を編成する。
各艦隊から艦艇を抽出、第三艦隊に「最上」「時雨」「満潮」「朝雲」「山雲」を配備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Mogami, Asagumo, Michishio, Shigure, and Yamagumo in 3rd Fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「三一駆」第一小隊、抜錨準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A83: Elite 31st Destroyer Division, 1st Platoon, Prepare to Sortie!
Quest.JP-Detail:
編成任務：「長波改二」旗艦、僚艦に「高波改」または「沖波改」「朝霜改」を配した、
第三一駆逐隊第一小隊(2隻艦隊)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Naganami Kai Ni as flagship and either Takanami Kai, Okinami Kai, or Asashimo Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「四水戦」抜錨準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A84: Elite 4th Destroyer Squadron, Prepare to Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail:
四水戦(4Sd)特別編成：「村雨改二」旗艦と精鋭四水戦「由良改二」「夕立改二」「春雨改」「五月雨改」
「秋月改」より3隻、さらに主力艦2隻を配備した、有力な特務艦隊を編成、南方海域出撃に備えよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Fill an entire six-ship fleet with Murasame Kai Ni as flagship, 3+ of Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai or Akizuki Kai and your choice of other ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」、抜錨準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A85: Elite 21st Destroyer Division, Prepare to Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail:
精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：捷一号作戦を支援する。同決戦正面の基地航空への資材輸送任務のため、
「若葉改」「初春改二」「初霜改二」を含む3～4隻の精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」の編成を完了せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Wakaba Kai, Hatsuharu Kai Ni and Hatsushimo Kai Ni, up to 1 other DD, and no other ships in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 改装「第十七駆逐隊」、再編始め！
Quest.TR-Name: A86: Remodeled 17th Destroyer Division, Commence Restructuring!
Quest.JP-Detail:
改装駆逐隊編成任務：改装した陽炎型駆逐艦「浦風改」「谷風改」、そして対空戦闘の激化に備え、
対空兵装を軸に大幅強化改装した「磯風乙改」「浜風乙改」による「第十七駆逐隊」を再編せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Hamakaze Kai B, Isokaze Kai B, Urakaze Kai and Tanikaze Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A87: Organize the Elite 18th Destroyer Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：「霰改二」「霞改二/改二乙」「陽炎改」「不知火改」4隻による
精鋭「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni/B, Kagerou Kai, and Shiranui Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、集結せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A88: Supreme Type-A Destroyers, Assemble!
Quest.JP-Detail:
甲型駆逐隊編成任務：「陽炎改二」「不知火改二」「黒潮改二」を集中配備、さらに練度70以上の
甲型駆逐艦【陽炎型/夕雲型駆逐艦】を3隻集中配備、精鋭艦隊型駆逐隊を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Kagerou Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, Kuroshio Kai Ni, and three level 70+ Kagerou/Yuugumo-class DD in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A89: Form the Elite 18th Cruiser Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
旧式小型軽巡部隊の改装再編成：改天龍型軽巡「天龍改二」及び「龍田改二」の2隻で
構成される精鋭「第十八戦隊」を再編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have ONLY Tenryuu Kai Ni and Tatsuta Kai Ni in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精強「第十七駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: A90: Form the Elite 17th Destroyer Division!
Quest.JP-Detail:
改装甲型駆逐隊編成任務：対空兵装を軸に大幅強化改装した「磯風乙改」「浜風乙改」、そして
対潜兵装を改装強化した「浦風丁改」「谷風丁改」による、精強「第十七駆逐隊」4隻を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Isokaze B Kai, Hamakaze B Kai, Urakaze D Kai and Tanikaze D Kai in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第十駆逐隊」、抜錨準備！
Quest.TR-Name: A91: Elite 10th Destroyer Division, Prepare To Sortie!
Quest.JP-Detail:
甲型駆逐艦編成任務：夕雲型駆逐艦「夕雲改二」及び「巻雲改二」の2隻から成る
精鋭第十駆逐隊(2隻編成)を編成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Yuugumo Kai Ni and Makigumo Kai Ni in your fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd1: Defeat an Enemy Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to any map and score a victory.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「出撃」！
Quest.TR-Name: B1: First Sortie
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie your main fleet on a combat mission.

Quest.JP-Name: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
Quest.TR-Name: B2: Protect the Sea Near the Naval Base
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面海域に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦の跳梁を阻止せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage.

Quest.JP-Name: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B4: Sortie to the Sea Around Nansei Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 南西諸島沖に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-2 and clear the stage.

Quest.JP-Name: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B5: Intercept Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 南西諸島沖に接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-2 AGAIN and clear the stage.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水雷戦隊」で出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B6: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡洋艦1隻を旗艦とし、複数の駆逐艦からなる水雷戦隊で出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a CL as flagship and 3 DD as escorts.

Quest.JP-Name: 「重巡洋艦」を出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B7: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser
Quest.JP-Detail: 重巡洋艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a CA as flagship.

Quest.JP-Name: 「戦艦」を出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B8: Sortie a Battleship
Quest.JP-Detail: 海上の覇者、戦艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count) as flagship.

Quest.JP-Name: 「空母機動部隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B9: Sortie a Carrier Task Force
Quest.JP-Detail: 空母1隻とその護衛艦艇で構成した空母機動部隊を出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with CV/CVL as flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd3: Defeat 10 Enemy Fleets
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊全力出撃！遊弋する敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Score 10 victories against any enemy fleets.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵空母を３隻撃沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd4: Sink 3 Enemy Carriers
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊の脅威となる敵空母群。これを捕捉撃滅し、3隻轟沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 3 enemy aircraft carriers (CV/CVL).

Quest.JP-Name: 敵輸送船団を叩け！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd6: Strike the Enemy Transports
Quest.JP-Detail: 敵の輸送船5隻以上を撃沈し、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 5 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上通商破壊作戦
Quest.TR-Name: Bw3: Disrupt the Marine Trade
Quest.JP-Detail: 1週間で敵輸送船を20隻以上撃沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 20 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Name: あ号作戦
Quest.TR-Name: Bw1: Operation A-Go
Quest.JP-Detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵艦隊を捕捉、これを迎撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie your fleet 36 times, encounter 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses and get 6 Perfect S rank victories.

Quest.JP-Name: 第２艦隊、出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B3: Second Fleet's Deployment
Quest.JP-Detail: 新たに編成した「第２艦隊」を出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd2: Sink an Enemy Flagship
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊「主力」を捕捉！これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink a flagship of any enemy fleet.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵空母を撃沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B10: Sink an Enemy Carrier
Quest.JP-Detail: 敵機動部隊を捕捉し、これを邀撃、敵空母を轟沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink an enemy aircraft carrier (CV/CVL).

Quest.JP-Name: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd5: Sink 3 Transport Ships
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵補給艦を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 3 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B11: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 新編成した「三川艦隊」で出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) and another fast ship.

Quest.JP-Name: い号作戦
Quest.TR-Name: Bw2: Operation I-Go
Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な母艦航空隊で1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵空母を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 20 enemy aircraft carriers (CV/CVL).

Quest.JP-Name: ろ号作戦
Quest.TR-Name: Bw4: Operation Ro-Go
Quest.JP-Detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、敵輸送船団を捕捉・撃滅、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 50 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B12: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」による第六駆逐隊、出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma, and Ikazuchi.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第四戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B13: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「愛宕」「高雄」「鳥海」「摩耶」を基幹とする第四戦隊で、バシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海), Maya (摩耶) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-2 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B14: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とする西村艦隊で、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Fusou (扶桑改二), Yamashiro (山城改二), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B15: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とする第五航空戦隊で、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and any 4 ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd7: Gain Control of the Nansei Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を南西諸島海域に全力出撃させ、多数の敵艦隊「主力」群を捕捉、撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 5 bosses in World 2.

Quest.JP-Name: 新「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B16: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 完全編成した「三川艦隊」をもって、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍). Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上護衛戦
Quest.TR-Name: Bw5: Naval Escort Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な対潜能力を持つ海上護衛隊によって、可能な限り多くの敵潜水艦を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 15 enemy submarines.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw6: Eliminate the Enemy's Eastern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 西方海域に出撃し、敵東方艦隊の主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 12 bosses in World 4.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵潜水艦を制圧せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd8: Suppress the Enemy Submarines
Quest.JP-Detail: 対潜能力の充実した艦隊で出撃、敵潜水艦狩りを実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 6 enemy submarines.

Quest.JP-Name: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊でオリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: B17: Sortie a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B18: Sortie a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦2隻と航空巡洋艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊でカレー洋の制海権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 4-2 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B19: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第六戦隊」をもって出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅「完全勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Kinugasa (衣笠), Aoba (青葉) and 2 additional ships. Score an S rank victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 水上反撃作戦【礼号作戦】を完遂せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Complete Operation Rei-go
Quest.JP-Detail: カンパン湾より突入部隊を出撃させ、水上反撃作戦【礼号作戦】を完遂せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Clear E-2.

Quest.JP-Name: 近海哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B135: Patrol the Coastal Waters!
Quest.JP-Detail:
哨戒任務：軽巡級1隻以上、駆逐艦または海防艦計3隻以上による艦隊で、鎮守府海域の南西諸島沖及び
製油所地帯沿岸、南西諸島海域の南西諸島近海及びバシー海峡の哨戒を実施、敵を捕捉撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Sortie a fleet with 1 Light Cruiser, 3 Destroyers/Coastal Defense Ships, and up to 2 additional ships to Worlds 1-2, 1-3, 2-1, and 2-2.
Obtain an S-rank at each boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「二四駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B136: Peerless "DesDiv 24", Sortie!
Quest.JP-Detail:
二四駆出撃任務：「海風改二」を旗艦とし、「山風」「江風」「涼風」のうち2隻以上を含む艦隊を編成、
東部オリョール海、沖ノ島海域、南方海域前面、サブ島沖海域に突入！敵艦隊を捕捉、撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Sortie a fleet with Umikaze Kai Ni as flagship, 2 of Yamakaze, Kawakaze, and Suzukaze, and up to 3 additional ships to Worlds 2-3, 2-4, 5-1, and 5-3.
Obtain an S-rank at each boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B20: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮), Arashio (荒潮) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B21: Sortie the 18th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第十八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎), Shiranui (不知火) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw7: Eliminate the Main Forces of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方海域の深部に出撃し、敵北方艦隊の主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 5 bosses in Worlds 3-3, 3-4 or 3-5.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw8: Crush the Core of the Eastern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 西方海域カスガダマ島沖に出撃し、敵東方中枢艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat World 4-4 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw9: Seize Air Superiority in the South
Quest.JP-Detail: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖に出撃し、敵機動部隊本体を捕捉撃滅、これに完全勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Score two S rank victories at the boss node of World 5-2.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B22: Sortie the 30th Destroyer Division (Gen.1)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」を含む艦隊で出撃し、キス島沖の主力艦隊と交戦せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet that consists of Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生), Mochizuki (望月) and up to 2 additional DD to World 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required.

Quest.JP-Name: 式の準備！(最終)
Quest.TR-Name: WB01: In Preparation of Love! (Final)
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度の高い(Lv.90～99)第一艦隊旗艦で出撃し、オリョール海の暁に勝利を刻め！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a high level (Lv.90~99) flagship to 2-3 obtain an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 二人でする初めての任務！
Quest.TR-Name: WB02: Your First Mission Together!
Quest.JP-Detail: 強い絆を結んだ艦娘を旗艦とした第一艦隊でリランカ島へ出撃、敵中枢を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet to 4-3 with a bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「航空戦艦」抜錨せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B23: Aviation Battleship, Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊で、西方海域カスガダマ島の敵勢力を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十駆逐隊」対潜哨戒！
Quest.TR-Name: B24: 30th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」は直ちに抜錨！鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) to World 1-5 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm1: Sortie the 5th Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第五戦隊」は沖ノ島沖の戦闘哨戒を実施、敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) to World 2-5. You may add 3 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B25: Sortie the 2nd Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 新編「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、珊瑚諸島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and 2 DD to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B26: Elite 2nd Carrier Division, Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail: 錬成を終え再編成「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、敵リランカ島を空襲、破砕せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Souryuu Kai2 (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) and 2 DD to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 戦艦「榛名」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B27: Deploy a Fleet Led By Haruna
Quest.JP-Detail: 第二次改装実施した「榛名」を基幹とした艦隊で「南方海域」へ進出、敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Haruna Kai2 (榛名改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六〇一航空隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B28: Sortie the 601 Air Group!
Quest.JP-Detail: 雲龍型航空母艦「雲龍改」含む機動部隊で珊瑚島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Unryuu Kai (雲龍改) as the flagship to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「軽空母」戦隊、出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B29: Sortie a Light Carrier Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽空母1～2隻、軽巡1隻、駆逐艦3～4隻の艦隊で南西諸島近海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DD to World 2-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
Quest.TR-Name: B30: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron to Bashi Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡を旗艦とした水雷戦隊(軽巡最大2隻他駆逐艦)でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CL (one as the flagship) and 4-5 DD to World 2-2. Score a victory at the boss and sink the enemy flagship.

Quest.JP-Name: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 潜水艦戦力を中核とした艦隊で中部海域哨戒線へ反復出撃、敵戦力を漸減せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Bm2: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S rank victory at the boss node 3 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水雷戦隊」南西へ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm3: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡旗艦の水雷戦隊(軽巡最大3隻他駆逐艦)を急派、南西諸島防衛線で敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-3 CL (one as the flagship) and 3-5 DD to World 1-4. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二戦隊」抜錨！
Quest.TR-Name: B31: Sortie the 2nd Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二戦隊」を基幹とした艦隊でカレー洋に進出、反復出撃により敵海上兵力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, Yamashiro and up to 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score two S rank victories at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水上打撃部隊」南方へ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm4: Surface Strike Fleet, Onwards to the South!
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦3隻軽巡1隻他を基幹とした水上打撃部隊で南方海域へ進出、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie 3 BB/BBV (only slow battleships), 1 CL and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B32: Sortie a Battleship Squadron to the Northern Sea
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦2隻と直援軽空母1隻(正規空母無し)基幹の艦隊で北方AL海域に突入、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie 2 BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count), 1 CVL and up to 3 additional ships and score an S rank victory at the World 3-5 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw10: Secure the Marine Transportation Route
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を反復実施し、安全な海上輸送路を確保せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-5 and score an A rank victory (or higher) at the boss node 3 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B33: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet to the Southern Waters
Quest.JP-Detail: 「西村艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、敵主力艦隊へ突入、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and Michishio, and another ship and score an S rank victory at World 5-1 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B34: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Waters
Quest.JP-Detail: 「古鷹」「加古」「青葉」「衣笠」を基幹とした「第六戦隊」で、沖ノ島沖の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「空母機動部隊」西へ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm6: Carrier Task Force, Onwards to the West!
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空母艦2隻(随伴駆逐艦2隻)を基幹とする空母機動艦隊で、カレー洋の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet consisting of 2 CV/CVL, 2 DD and 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上護衛強化月間
Quest.TR-Name: Bm5: Monthly Escort Duty
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面海域の対潜哨戒を強化し、敵潜水艦を制圧、安全な海上輸送体制を確立せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet to World 1-5 and score 10 A rank (or above) victories at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水上反撃部隊」突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm7: Sortie the Counterattack Squadron!
Quest.JP-Detail: 駆逐艦を旗艦とした重巡1隻軽巡1隻駆逐艦4隻からなる水上挺身部隊、沖ノ島沖に突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a DD flagship, 1 CA, 1 CL and 3 more DD to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B35: Sortie the 11th Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki (白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪), Murakumo (叢雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score a victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十一駆逐隊」対潜哨戒！
Quest.TR-Name: B36: 11th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo (叢雲) to World 1-5 and get a score of at least C at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B37: Sortie the 21st Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B39: Sortie the 22nd Destroyer Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二二駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で南西諸島防衛線に出撃、敵主力艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月), 1 more DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「那智戦隊」抜錨せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B38: Nachi Squadron, Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail: 旗艦「那智」及び「初霜」「霞」「潮」「曙」他1隻の艦隊でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Nachi (那智) as flagship, Hatsushimo (初霜), Kasumi (霞), Ushio (潮), Akebono (曙) and 1 additional ship to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「改装防空重巡」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B40: Sortie the Remodelled Anti-Aircraft Heavy Cruiser
Quest.JP-Detail: 摩耶改または摩耶改二及び軽巡1駆逐2隻を含む艦隊でオリョール海の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Maya (摩耶) Kai or Kai2, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
Quest.TR-Name: B41: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet to Solomon Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊に編成した「三川艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、同方面の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie the main fleet with Choukai Kai2 (鳥海改ニ) as the flagship and any 5 of Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍), Yuubari (夕張) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！
Quest.TR-Name: B42: 6th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi to World 1-5. At least C rank is required at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 抜錨！「第十八戦隊」
Quest.TR-Name: B43: 18th Cruiser Division, Set Sail!
Quest.JP-Detail: 「天龍」「龍田」を基幹戦力とした「第十八戦隊」で出撃し、オリョール海の敵主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and 2 or more other ships and score an S rank victory at World 2-3 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B44: Sortie the Maritime Assault Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「比叡」「霧島」「長良」「暁」「雷」「電」の艦隊で、南方海域進出作戦を実施、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma and score an S rank victory at World 5-1 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！
Quest.TR-Name: B45: 6th Destroyer Division's Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol na no desu
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面で対潜哨戒を実施、敵潜水艦部隊を痛打せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Akatsuki Kai2 as the flagship, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma and score an A rank victory at World 1-5 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B46: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方突入準備を完了した「一水戦」で北方キス島に突入！包囲網を破り、友軍を救出せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Abukuma (阿武隈) as the flagship, Hibiki, Hatsushimo (初霜), Wakaba (若葉), Samidare (五月雨) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score a victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
Quest.TR-Name: B47: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke Again
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方再突入準備の新編「一水戦」で北方キス島に再突入を敢行、同撤収作戦を完遂せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Abukuma Kai2 (阿武隈改二) as the flagship, Hibiki, Yuugumo (夕雲), Naganami (長波), Akigumo (秋雲) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 兵站線確保！海上警備を強化実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bm8: Secure the Supply Lines! Strengthen the Marine Guards!
Quest.JP-Detail:
海上警備任務：軽空母または軽巡級1隻、駆逐艦または海防艦を計3隻以上配備した海上護衛艦隊で、
南西諸島沖警備、海上護衛作戦、南1号作戦、南西諸島哨戒を実施、各作戦海域の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a CL/CVL, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 additional ships to Worlds 1-2, 1-3, 1-4 and 2-1. Obtain an S-rank at each boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 南西諸島方面「海上警備行動」発令！
Quest.TR-Name: Bq11: "Surface Security Actions" around the Nansei Archipelago Annoucement
Quest.JP-Detail:
海上警備任務：軽空母または軽巡級1隻、駆逐艦または海防艦を計3隻以上配備した海上護衛艦隊で、
南1号作戦、南西諸島哨戒、柳作戦、オリョール哨戒を実施、各作戦海域に出没する敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with 1 CVL/CL, 3 or more DD/DE and up to 2 additional ships to Worlds 1-4, 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3 and score an S-rank at each boss node. Reward 80 ranking points.

Quest.JP-Name: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B49: Sortie an Aircraft Carrier Task Force to the Aleutian Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空母艦を旗艦とした空母機動部隊を北方AL海域方面に展開、敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a CV flagship to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B48: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化し、海上資源輸送路の安全を確立せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-5 and score 4 victories at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B50: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division to the South
Quest.JP-Detail: 再編成した「第五航空戦隊」を珊瑚諸島沖に展開、敵機動部隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴), Oboro (朧), Akigumo (秋雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B51: Sortie the New 21st Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 新編「第二一戦隊」を基幹とする艦隊で北方海域モーレイ海に出撃、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Nachi Kai2 (那智改二), Ashigara Kai2 (足柄改二), Tama (多摩), Kiso (木曾) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B52: Sortie the 16th Squadron (1st Gen.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」をバシー島沖に展開、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Ashigara (足柄) as the flagship, Kuma (球磨), Nagara (長良) and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 秋刀魚漁：「秋刀魚」を収獲しよう！
Quest.TR-Name: Saury Fishing: Let's Harvest Some Saury
Quest.JP-Detail: 近海及び北方海域の漁場に展開する敵艦隊を撃破して、「秋刀魚」を3尾入手せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat enemy fleets in Worlds 1 and 3 and gather 3 saury.

Quest.JP-Name: 秋刀魚漁：「秋刀魚」をもっと収獲しなきゃ！
Quest.TR-Name: Saury Fishing: You've Got to Harvest More Saury
Quest.JP-Detail: ちょっと大変だけれど、漁場の安全を確保して「秋刀魚」を10尾確保しなきゃ駄目よ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Ensure the safety of the fishing grounds and have a total of 10 saury.

Quest.JP-Name: 秋刀魚漁：もっと頑張ってもいいのよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Saury Fishing: Let's Harvest Even More Saury
Quest.JP-Detail: かなり大変だけれど、秋刀魚漁、もっともっと頑張ってもいいのよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Work hard and have a total of 30 saury.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！
Quest.TR-Name: B53: Sortie the 3rd Carrier Division to Protect the Nansei Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第三航空戦隊」を南西諸島防衛線に展開、敵侵攻艦隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Zuikaku Kai (瑞鶴改) as the flagship, aircraft carriers Zuihou (瑞鳳), Chitose (千歳) and Chiyoda (千代田), and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「小沢艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B54: Sortie the Ozawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「小沢艦隊」を沖ノ島海域前面に展開し、侵攻する敵機動部隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as the flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose, Chiyoda, Ise Kai, and Hyuuga Kai to World 2-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B55: Sortie the 16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」をオリョール海に展開、敵主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Natori (名取) as the flagship, Isuzu (五十鈴), Kinu (鬼怒) and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B56: Sortie the New Carrier Division to the North
Quest.JP-Detail: 「新編成航空戦隊」をアルフォンシーノ方面へ進出、敵泊地の機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie 2 fleet carriers, 2 aviation battleships or aviation cruisers and 2 destroyers and score an S rank victory at the World 3-3 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「礼号作戦」実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B57: Operation Rei-go
Quest.JP-Detail: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」で、南西諸島沖ノ島沖に突入！同海域の敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Kasumi as the flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, and Kiyoshimo, and up to 3 additional ships and score an S rank victory at the World 2-5 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第七駆逐隊」、南西諸島を駆ける！
Quest.TR-Name: B124: 7th Destroyer Division, sail to the Nansei Islands Region!
Quest.JP-Detail:
「曙」「潮」「漣」「朧」から成る「第七駆逐隊」2隻以上を含む有力な艦隊を編成、南西諸島近海、
バシー海峡、東部オリョール海、沖ノ島海域の敵戦力を撃滅、南西諸島海域の制海権を確保せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie any two of Akebono, Ushio, Sazanami and Oboro and up to 4 additional ships to [W2-1], [W2-2], [W2-3] and [W2-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes.

Quest.JP-Name: 近海の警戒監視と哨戒活動を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B125: Reinforce Surveillance and Patrols of the Coastal Sea!
Quest.JP-Detail:
軽巡旗艦、駆逐艦または海防艦2隻を含む艦隊を編成、南西諸島沖、製油所地帯沿岸、
南西諸島防衛線、南西諸島近海、バシー海峡を哨戒、敵艦隊を捕捉撃滅、近海の制海権を確立せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a CL as flagship, 2 DD/DE and up to 3 additional ships to [W1-2], [W1-3], [W1-4], [W2-1] and [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss nodes.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「演習」！
Quest.TR-Name: C1: Your First Exercise
Quest.JP-Detail: 他の提督(プレイヤー)の艦隊と「演習」を行おう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Challenge another fleet in exercises.

Quest.JP-Name: 大規模演習
Quest.TR-Name: C4w: Large-scale Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「演習」で他の提督の艦隊に対して20回「勝利」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 20 victories in exercises within the same week.

Quest.JP-Name: 「演習」で練度向上！
Quest.TR-Name: C2d1: Do Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊に対して3回「演習」を挑もう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Challenge 3 other fleets in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 「演習」で他提督を圧倒せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C3d2: Defeat Other Admirals
Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊との「演習」で5回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 5 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 式の準備！(その弐)
Quest.TR-Name: WC01: In Preparation of Love (Part 2)
Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「演習」で2回以上「勝利」をおさめ、式への気持ちを整理しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Show your love by getting 2 victories in exercises.

Quest.JP-Name: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C5: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 作戦前に艦隊の練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で3回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 3 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C6: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet Again
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊のさらなる練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C7: Prepare for the Second Iteration of Operation Ke
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊再突入に備え、艦隊練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: FS作戦に備え、艦隊練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Prepare for Operation FS
Quest.JP-Detail: FS作戦に備え、艦隊練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭艦隊演習
Quest.TR-Name: C8m: Elite Fleet Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 同日中に「演習」で7回以上「勝利」をおさめ、我が精鋭艦隊の練度を示そう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 7 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 上陸部隊演習
Quest.TR-Name: C9: Landing Force Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 島嶼攻略部隊の練度向上のため、本日中に演習で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 秋季大演習
Quest.TR-Name: C10: Autumn Large-scale Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 秋の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 8 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 冬季大演習
Quest.TR-Name: C11: Winter Large-scale Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 冬季大演習：冬の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 8 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 春季大演習
Quest.TR-Name: C12: Spring Large-scale Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 春季大演習：春の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 8 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 輸送部隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C13: Raise the Transport Unit's Experience!
Quest.JP-Detail: 演習任務：輸送部隊の練度向上を図る！本日中に演習で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 甲型駆逐艦の戦力整備計画
Quest.TR-Name: C14: Type-A Destroyer Strength Improvement Plan
Quest.JP-Detail:
甲型駆逐艦整備任務：甲型駆逐艦【夕雲型/陽炎型】を2隻以上配備した第一艦隊で演習で3回「勝利」、
その後、同艦隊を南西諸島海域に投入。各出撃で得られた戦訓を艦隊型駆逐艦戦力整備に活用せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 3 victories in exercises and then obtain an A-rank victory at [W2-2], [W2-3], [W2-4], and [W2-5] boss using the main fleet including 2 Kagerou-Class or Yuugumo-Class Destroyers.

Quest.JP-Name: 給糧艦「伊良湖」の支援
Quest.TR-Name: C15: Monthly Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail:
伊良湖支援任務：軽巡を2隻以上配備した第一艦隊で本日中に演習で3回「勝利」、その後、
第一艦隊旗艦に戦闘糧食を二つ装備せよ！　※任務達成後、同戦闘糧食は消費します
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 3 victories in Exercises using 2 CLs. Afterwards, equip the Fleet 1 flagship with 2 Combat Rations.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第二一駆」、猛特訓！
Quest.TR-Name: C17: Elite 21st Destroyer Division, Train Intensively!
Quest.JP-Detail:
駆逐隊演習任務：精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」3隻を含む艦隊を編成。作戦に先立ち、猛特訓を開始する！
同艦隊で、本日中に演習で4回勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using Hatsuharu Kai Ni, Wakaba Kai, Hatsushimo Kai Ni and up to 3 other ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 駆逐隊、特訓始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C18: Destroyer Division, Commence Intensive Training!
Quest.JP-Detail:
駆逐隊演習任務：駆逐艦4隻で編成される駆逐隊。この駆逐隊を含む艦隊を編成。
特訓を開始する！同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 4 DD and up to 2 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 五周年任務【肆：演習】
Quest.TR-Name: 5A04: Fifth Anniversary Mission IV: Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail:
五周年任務：駆逐艦または海防艦2隻以上を含む五隻の特別編成の艦隊を編成！
この五周年特別艦隊で、本日中に演習で4回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 2 DD/DE and 3 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 海防艦、演習始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C20: Kaiboukan, Commence Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
海防艦演習任務：海防艦を旗艦に配備し、随伴艦に駆逐艦2隻以上を配した演習艦隊を編成。
本演習艦隊で、本日中に演習で2回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 2 victories in Exercises within the same day using a DE flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、特訓始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C21: Supreme Type-A Destroyers, Commence Intensive Training!
Quest.JP-Detail:
甲型駆逐隊演習任務：練度70以上の甲型駆逐艦【陽炎型/夕雲型】駆逐艦4隻で編成される駆逐隊。
この精鋭駆逐隊を含む艦隊を編成。演習を開始する！同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 4 Lv70+ Kagerou/Yuugumo-class DD and up to 2 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 戦闘航空母艦一番艦、演習始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C18: Battle Carrier Lead Ship, Commence Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
改装航空戦艦(戦闘航空母艦)演習任務：旗艦「伊勢改二」、随伴艦に駆逐艦2隻以上を配した航空戦隊
を編成。新改装艦の慣熟も兼ねた同航空戦隊の演習で、本日中に3回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 3 victories in Exercises within the same day using Ise Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD and up to 3 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 夏季大演習
Quest.TR-Name: C22: Mass Exercises for Summer
Quest.JP-Detail:
夏季大演習：夏季期間の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
暑さに負けるな！　艦隊、抜錨！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 朝潮型集合！特訓始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C25: Asashio-class, Assemble! Commence Intensive Training!
Quest.JP-Detail:
朝潮型演習任務：朝潮型駆逐艦4隻による駆逐隊を含む艦隊を編成。
同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！朝潮型駆逐艦、前へ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using at least four of Asashio-class and up to 2 additional ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 【節分任務】節分演習！
Quest.TR-Name: SB56: Setsubun Mission: "Setsubun Exercises!"
Quest.JP-Detail:
節分任務：駆逐艦または海防艦2隻を含む節分艦隊を編成、同艦隊を以て、節分演習を実施する！
令和二年節分演習艦隊で、本日中に演習において【完全勝利】を3回以上達成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Use a fleet with at least 2 Coastal Defense Ships/Destroyers to obtain an S-rank in Exercises 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 空母機動部隊、演習始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C29: Carrier Task Force, Commence Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
空母機動部隊演習任務：航空母艦旗艦他1隻計2隻以上及び駆逐艦2隻を含む空母機動部隊を編成。
機動部隊各艦の練度向上を図る！同艦隊で、本日中に演習で4回以上勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Use a fleet with a CVL/CV/CVB as flagship, 1 other CVL/CV/CVB, 2 DD, and up to 2 additional ships to obtain a B-rank (or higher) in Exercises 4 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 六周年記念演習
Quest.TR-Name: C32: 6th Anniversary Exercise
Quest.JP-Detail:
六周年記念演習：軽巡クラス1隻と駆逐艦または海防艦計3隻以上を含む6隻編成の特務艦隊を編成。
同艦隊による演習で本日中に【S判定】以上4回勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Use a fleet with 1 Light Cruiser, 3 Destroyers/Coastal Defense Ships, and any 2 other ships to obtain an S-rank in Exercises 4 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 航空戦隊演習(その壱)
Quest.TR-Name: C33: Aviation Squadron Exercises (Part 1)
Quest.JP-Detail:
航空戦隊演習任務：航空母艦3隻以上及び駆逐艦2隻以上を含む航空戦隊を編成。艦隊戦演習により、
戦技及び練度向上を図る。同航空戦隊で、本日中に演習を【S判定】勝利3回以上達成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Use a fleet with 3 Light Aircraft Carriers/Standard Aircraft Carriers/Armored Aircraft Carriers, 2 Destroyers, and up to 1 additional ship.
Obtain an S-rank in Exercises 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 航空戦隊演習(その弐)
Quest.TR-Name: C34: Aviation Squadron Exercises (Part 2)
Quest.JP-Detail:
航空戦隊演習任務：航空母艦3隻以上及び駆逐艦2隻以上を含む航空戦隊を編成。大規模演習により、
さらなる戦技及び練度向上を図る。同航空戦隊で、本日中に演習を【S判定】勝利6回以上達成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Use a fleet with 3 Light Aircraft Carriers/Standard Aircraft Carriers/Armored Aircraft Carriers, 2 Destroyers, and up to 1 additional ship.
Obtain an S-rank in Exercises 6 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 新しき盾
Quest.TR-Name: C35: A New Shield
Quest.JP-Detail:
「新しき盾」演習任務：重巡「摩耶」及び重巡「羽黒」を擁する艦隊による演習「新しき盾」を実施する。
本「新しき盾」演習において、本日中に【S判定】勝利3回以上達成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Use a fleet with Maya, Haguro, and up to 4 additional ships.
Obtain an S-rank in Exercises 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 「十八駆」演習！
Quest.TR-Name: C38: DesDiv 18 Exercise!
Quest.JP-Detail:
駆逐艦演習任務：第十八駆逐隊「霞」「霰」「陽炎」「不知火」の4隻を含む演習艦隊を編成。
同艦隊で本日中に演習で【S判定】勝利3回以上を達成せよ！精鋭十八駆に落ち度など無し！
Quest.TR-Detail: Use a fleet with Kagerou, Shiranui, Kasumi, Arare, and up to 2 additional ships to obtain an S-rank in Exercises 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 睦月型集合！演習始め！
Quest.TR-Name: C39: Mutsuki-class, Assemble! Commence Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
睦月型演習任務：睦月型駆逐艦4隻による駆逐隊を含む演習艦隊を編成。
同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！睦月型、がんばるにゃしぃ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Use a fleet with 4 Mutsuki-class ships and up to 2 additional ships.
Obtain a B-rank (or higher) in Exercises (PvP) 4 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 「十九駆」演習！
Quest.TR-Name: C42: "DesDiv 19" Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
駆逐艦演習任務：第十九駆逐隊「磯波」「浦波」「綾波」「敷波」の4隻を含む演習艦隊を編成。
同艦隊で本日中に演習で【S判定】勝利3回以上を達成せよ！精鋭十九駆、じゃ、見ててよね！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Use a fleet with Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami, Shikinami, and up to 2 additional ships.
Obtain an S-rank in Exercises (PvP) 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 【桃の節句任務】桃の節句演習！
Quest.TR-Name: 20WiC1: Peach Festival Exercises!
Quest.JP-Detail:
桃の節句任務：駆逐艦または海防艦計3隻を含む桃の節句艦隊を編成、同艦隊を以て、演習を実施！
桃の節句演習艦隊で、本日中に演習において【S判定】勝利を3回以上達成せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Use a fleet with 3 Destroyers and up to 3 additional ships to obtain an S-rank in Exercises 3 times within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「遠征」！
Quest.TR-Name: D1: First Expedition
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を「遠征」に出発させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform an expedition.

Quest.JP-Name: 「遠征」を３回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Name: D2d1: Complete 3 Expeditions
Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「遠征」３回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 「遠征」を１０回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Name: D3d2: Complete 10 Expeditions
Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「遠征」10回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 大規模遠征作戦、発令！
Quest.TR-Name: D4w1: Large-scale Expedition Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「遠征」30回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

Quest.JP-Name: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
Quest.TR-Name: D5: The First Submarine Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: はじめての潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30.

Quest.JP-Name: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦
Quest.TR-Name: D6: The Second Submarine Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 one more time.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！
Quest.TR-Name: D7: Continuation of Submarine Operations
Quest.JP-Detail: 第三次及び第四次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 two more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
Quest.TR-Name: D8: Strategy Meeting with Overseas Submarine Dispatch
Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触作戦を成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 31 and receive foreign destroyer Z1!

Quest.JP-Name: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D9w2: Transportation Towards South
Quest.JP-Detail: 激戦海域である南方海域への「東京急行」系遠征を敢行、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 37 or 38.

Quest.JP-Name: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D11w3: Transportation Towards South (Cont.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「東京急行」系遠征を継続的に実施、同種作戦を7回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 37 or 38 a total of seven times in a week.

Quest.JP-Name: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D10: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV
Quest.JP-Detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 23.

Quest.JP-Name: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D12: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV (Cont.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を継続実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に引き続き努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 23 four more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D13: Blue Waters Submarine Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 39.

Quest.JP-Name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D14: Blue Waters Extended Submarine Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を継続実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 39 two more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D15: Air Defense Exercises
Quest.JP-Detail: 「防空射撃演習」を複数回実施し、艦隊の防空能力を高めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 6 three times.

Quest.JP-Name: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D16: Deploy the Decoy Task Force
Quest.JP-Detail: 「囮機動部隊支援作戦」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 15.

Quest.JP-Name: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D17: Naval Ceremony Preparations
Quest.JP-Detail: 観艦式を実施する。予行として「観艦式予行」を複数回実施し、これを2回成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 7 two times.

Quest.JP-Name: 観艦式を敢行せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D18: Naval Review
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度の高い艦隊で観艦式本番を実施する。「観艦式」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 8.

Quest.JP-Name: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D19: Strengthen the Carrier Task Force Operations
Quest.JP-Detail: 機動部隊遠征を実施、「MO作戦」及び「敵母港空襲作戦」を展開、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expeditions 26 and 35.

Quest.JP-Name: 親善艦参加観艦式を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Have Friendly Ship Participate in Naval Review
Quest.JP-Detail: 期間限定海域において、海外からの親善艦を招いて特別観艦式を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Send six ships (flagship level 6+, summary level 15+) and complete expedition 175 (親善艦参加観艦式).

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による航空機技術入手
Quest.TR-Name: D20: Obtain Aviation Engineering from Submarine Dispatch Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 潜水艦派遣作戦により、新型航空機技術の導入に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 and 31.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による噴式技術の入手
Quest.TR-Name: D21: Obtain Jet Engine Technology from Submarine Dispatch Operation
Quest.JP-Detail:
鉄鋼5,000及びボーキサイト1,500を準備して、潜水艦派遣作戦により
噴式エンジン技術の導入に努めよ！※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 5000 steel and 1500 bauxite while completing Expedition 30 and 31 again.

Quest.JP-Name: 輸送船団護衛を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D22m: Reinforce the Transport Escort!
Quest.JP-Detail: 遠征任務：「海上護衛任務」を反復実施し、輸送船団の護衛に務めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 5 four times.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上護衛総隊、遠征開始！
Quest.TR-Name: D23: Maritime Escort Squadron, Expedition Start!
Quest.JP-Detail:
遠征任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「海上護衛任務」「タンカー護衛任務」を実施、
軽巡、駆逐艦、海防艦などから編成された護衛艦隊で各遠征を成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 4, 5 and 9.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上通商航路の警戒を厳とせよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D24q1: Stay Alert on the Maritime Routes!
Quest.JP-Detail:
遠征任務：遠征任務「警備任務」「対潜警戒任務」「海上護衛任務」「強行偵察任務」
を実施し、敵の通商破壊部隊を制圧、海上通商航路の安全を確保せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 3, 4, 5, and 10.

Quest.JP-Name: 遠征「補給」支援体制を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D25: Reinforce the Expedition Supply Support System!
Quest.JP-Detail:
遠征補給支援体制の強化：鋼材800を用意し、遠征任務「兵站強化任務」を実施。
同遠征任務を成功させ、艦隊遠征時における「補給」支援体制の拡充に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 800 steel and complete expedition A1.

Quest.JP-Name: 近海に侵入する敵潜を制圧せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D26q2: Suppress the Enemy Submarines Invading Nearby!
Quest.JP-Detail:
敵潜制圧任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「海峡警備行動」「長時間対潜警戒」を
それぞれ複数回実施し、近海に潜り込む敵潜部隊を制圧、我が領海から叩き出せ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 4, A2, and A3 two times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「捷一号作戦」、発動準備！
Quest.TR-Name: D27: Begin Preparations for Operation Sho 1!
Quest.JP-Detail:
捷一号作戦準備任務：遠征任務「警備任務」「兵站強化任務」及び「南西方面航空偵察作戦」
を実施。これを無事完遂し、南西方面での作戦準備にあたれ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 3, A1, and B1.

Quest.JP-Name: 「海防艦」、進発せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D28: Kaiboukan, Advance!
Quest.JP-Detail:
海上護衛任務：遠征任務「兵站強化任務」「海峡警備行動」「海上護衛任務」「タンカー護衛任務」
を海防艦、駆逐艦などを主軸とした護衛艦艇で実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expeditions 5, 9, A1, and A2.

Quest.JP-Name: 警備及び哨戒偵察を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D30: Reinforce our Defenses as well as Scout Patrols!
Quest.JP-Detail:
警備哨戒任務：遠征「海峡警備行動」「強行偵察任務」「南西方面航空偵察作戦」を実施、
南方戦線遠征の前段作戦として、内地及び南西諸島方面の警備及び哨戒偵察を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expeditions 10, A2, and B1 once each.

Quest.JP-Name: 特設護衛船団司令部、活動開始！
Quest.TR-Name: D32: Establishing the Special Escort Convoy Headquarters!
Quest.JP-Detail:
海上護衛任務：遠征任務「警備任務」「海上護衛任務」「兵站強化任務」「海峡警備行動」
「タンカー護衛任務」の各任務を、海防艦・駆逐艦などを主軸とした護衛艦艇で実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expeditions 3, 5, 9, A1, and A2 once each.

Quest.JP-Name: 【桃の節句任務】桃の節句遠征！
Quest.TR-Name: 20WiD1: Peach Festival Expedition!
Quest.JP-Detail:
桃の節句任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「強行偵察任務」「包囲陸戦隊撤収作戦」
「南西方面航空偵察作戦」「長時間対潜警戒」の各遠征を実施、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expeditions 4, 10, 14, B1, and A3.

Quest.JP-Name: 練習航海及び警備任務を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D33: Carry out a Training Voyage as well as Guard Duty!
Quest.JP-Detail:
練習航海及び警備任務：「練習航海」「長距離練習航海」「警備任務」「対潜警戒任務」
「強行偵察任務」の各遠征任務を、軽巡・駆逐艦・海防艦などの艦艇で実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expeditions 1, 2, 3, 4, and 10 once each.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「補給」！
Quest.TR-Name: E1: First Supply
Quest.JP-Detail: 補給は大事です！燃料・弾薬を艦に「補給」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Resupply a ship.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「入渠」！
Quest.TR-Name: E2: First Docking
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦闘で傷ついた艦を「入渠」させて修理して、次の出撃に備えよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Repair a ship.

Quest.JP-Name: 艦隊大整備！
Quest.TR-Name: E3d1: Daily Repairs
Quest.JP-Detail: 各艦隊から整備が必要な艦を5隻以上ドック入りさせ、大規模な整備をしよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Repair 5 ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 艦隊酒保祭り！
Quest.TR-Name: E4d2: Daily Resupplies
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊酒保祭り！各艦に延べ15回以上の補給を実施しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Resupply your ships 15 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務【おにぎりを作る！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su01: Accounting Department Mission: Time to Make Onigiri!
Quest.JP-Detail:
主計科任務：回収した「お米」炊いて、「おにぎり」を作ろう。
海の上で食う握り飯は……美味いぞ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 5 Rice and make an Onigiri.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務【おにぎりを振舞おう！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su02: Accounting Department Mission: Treat Everyone to Some Onigiri!
Quest.JP-Detail:
主計科任務：「お米」一杯炊いて、「おにぎり」を新たに3回作るかも。
工廠の皆に差し入れで振舞いたいかも！　※任務達成後、作った戦闘糧食は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 15 Rice and make 3 Onigiri.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務【高級おにぎりを作る！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su03: Accounting Department Mission: Time to Make High-Class Onigiri!
Quest.JP-Detail:
主計科任務：美味しい「お米」と「梅干」と「海苔」で、「高級おにぎり」を作りましょう。
いい食材で、丁寧に作った握り飯は……美味しい！提督、美味しいです！
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 6 Rice, 2 Umeboshi and 3 Nori to make a High-Class Onigiri.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務【差し入れ！高級おにぎり】
Quest.TR-Name: Su04: Accounting Department Mission: Supplies Incoming! High-Class Rice Balls
Quest.JP-Detail:
主計科任務：そうだ、提督、いいこと考えました！この美味しい「高級おにぎり」を一杯作って
空技廠の皆さんに差し入れしましょう！ね、加賀さん！(※高級おにぎりを後2回作りましょう)
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 12 Rice, 4 Umeboshi, and 6 Nori. Then make 2 High-Class Onigiri.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務【お茶漬けを作る！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su05: Accounting Department Mission: Time to Make Ochazuke!
Quest.JP-Detail:
主計科任務：「お米」と「梅干」と「海苔」、そして良い「お茶」で、「お茶漬け」を作りましょう。
さらさら～っと食べれるお茶漬けは、夜食にも、飲みの後の〆の一杯としても最高ですね！
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 8 Rice, 3 Umeboshi, 3 Nori, 4 Tea, and make Ochazuke.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務 【お茶漬け、夜食にどうぞ！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su06: Accounting Department Mission: Here, Have Some Ochazuke for Supper!
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 16 Rice, 6 Umeboshi, 6 Nori, 8 Tea, and make 2 Ochazuke.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務 【海苔巻きを作ろう！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su07: Accounting Department Mission: Let's Make Nori Rolls!
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 12 Rice and 6 Nori.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科任務 【和定食膳を作って完食！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su08: Accounting Department Mission: Make a Japanese Set Meal and Eat Up!
Quest.TR-Detail: Collect 26 Rice, 5 Umeboshi, 6 Nori, and 7 Tea. Then make 1 Japanese Meal Set and 3 Onigiri.

Quest.JP-Name: 主計科拡張任務 【日の丸弁当、量産！】
Quest.TR-Name: Su09: Accounting Department Extra Mission: Rising Sun Lunch Boxes for Everyone!

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「建造」！
Quest.TR-Name: F1: First Construction
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で鋼材などの資材を使って新しい艦を「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a ship.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「開発」！
Quest.TR-Name: F2: First Development
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」でボーキサイトなどの資材を使って新しい装備アイテムを「開発」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a piece of equipment.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「解体」！
Quest.TR-Name: F3: First Dismantlement
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な艦を「解体」してみよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Dismantle a ship.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「廃棄」！
Quest.TR-Name: F4: First Scrapping
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムを「廃棄」してみよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap a piece of equipment.

Quest.JP-Name: 新装備「開発」指令
Quest.TR-Name: F5d1: Develop New Equipment
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを新たに「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a piece of equipment. (Failures are OK)

Quest.JP-Name: 新造艦「建造」指令
Quest.TR-Name: F6d2: Construct New Ship
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に新たに「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a ship.

Quest.JP-Name: 装備「開発」集中強化！
Quest.TR-Name: F7d3: Develop More Equipment
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを本日中に3回「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft 3 pieces of equipment. (Failures are OK)

Quest.JP-Name: 艦娘「建造」艦隊強化！
Quest.TR-Name: F8d4: Construct More New Ships
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊強化のため、「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に3隻「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft 3 ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 軍縮条約対応！
Quest.TR-Name: F9d5: Dismantlement Duty
Quest.JP-Detail: 少し艦隊規模が大きくなりすぎました！「工廠」で不要な艦を2隻「解体」してください！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap 2 ships.

Quest.JP-Name: 「大型艦建造」の準備！(その弐)
Quest.TR-Name: F10: Preparation for LSC (Part 2)
Quest.JP-Detail: 大型艦建造の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを4回「廃棄」してみてください！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 4 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 式の準備！(その壱)
Quest.TR-Name: WF01: In Preparation of Love (Part 1)
Quest.JP-Detail: 式の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを2回「廃棄」して身の回りの整理を！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 2 times to show your love!

Quest.JP-Name: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
Quest.TR-Name: F11: Prepare the Drum Canisters
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを3回「廃棄」して、輸送用のドラム缶を準備します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 3 times to acquire a shipping barrel.

Quest.JP-Name: 資源の再利用
Quest.TR-Name: F12w1: Recycling Resources
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で余剰の装備アイテムをなるべく多く「廃棄」して、鋼材の再利用に努めよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 24 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 「九七式艦攻(友永隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F13: Equip a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Tenzan. The Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 「九九式艦爆(江草隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「彗星」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F14: Equip a Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Suisei. The Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「烈風」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F15: Equip a Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Reppuu. The Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 「伊良湖」の準備
Quest.TR-Name: F16: Preparing for Irako
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムをいくつか「廃棄」して、新型給糧艦召喚の準備をしましょう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 10 times.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「装備改修」！
Quest.TR-Name: F17: First Equipment Modernisation
Quest.JP-Detail: 「改修工廠」で「装備」を改修してみましょう！明石さん、お願いします！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform equipment modernisation once.

Quest.JP-Name: 装備の改修強化
Quest.TR-Name: F18d6: Improve Equipment
Quest.JP-Detail: 「改修工廠」で「装備」の改修強化に努めます。
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform equipment modernisation once.

Quest.JP-Name: 陸戦用装備の艦載運用研究
Quest.TR-Name: F89: Research of Ship-borne Land Based Equipment
Quest.JP-Detail:
第一艦隊旗艦軽巡級の第一装備スロに「7.7mm機銃」装備。「25mm単装機銃」x2、「ドラム缶(輸送
用)」x2、「12cm30連装噴進砲」x1を廃棄。弾薬x1,700、開発資材x30、高速建造材x10を準備せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail:
Equip a 7.7mm Machine Gun on the first equipment slot of your light cruiser flagship.
Then scrap 2 25mm Single Autocannons, 2 Drum Canisters, 1 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher, prepare 1,700 ammo, 30 development materials and 10 Instant Construction

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 「九七式艦攻(村田隊)」搭載「翔鶴」を秘書艦にして、新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F19: Equip a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) on Shoukaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Tenzan. The Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「九七式艦攻」部隊の編成
Quest.TR-Name: F20: Formation of the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」または「赤城」を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「九七式艦攻」を3つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With Shoukaku or Akagi as secretary, scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber.

Quest.JP-Name: 試作艤装の準備
Quest.TR-Name: F21: Prototype Flight Deck Outfitting Preparations
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを7つ「廃棄」して、「試製甲板カタパルト」を準備します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 7 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 試製航空艤装の追加試作
Quest.TR-Name: F23: Additional Prototype Deck Outfitting
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを9つ「廃棄」して、「試製甲板カタパルト」を追加試作します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 9 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「艦戦」隊の新編成
Quest.TR-Name: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
Quest.JP-Detail: 要熟練搭乗員：練度max「零戦21型」搭載「鳳翔」秘書艦で「零戦21型」x2「九六艦戦」x1廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F22m1: Equip a Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 on Houshou as secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter Model 21 and a Type 96 Fighter. A Skilled Pilot (熟練搭乗員) must be present in your inventory; it will be consumed. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載空母を秘書艦にして、新たに「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F24: Equip Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter Model 52. The Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度max「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載空母を秘書艦にして、新たに「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F25m2: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter Model 52. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 「艦戦」隊の再編成
Quest.TR-Name: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度max「零戦52型(熟練)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」を廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F26: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52 (Skilled) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap a Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group). The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52 (Skilled) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 「艦戦」隊の再編成
Quest.TR-Name: Reorganisation of the Fighter Forces
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度max「零戦21型(熟練)」搭載「瑞鶴」が秘書の状態で、「零戦21型」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F28: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter Model 21. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換＆部隊再編
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion and Force Reorganisation
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度max「零戦52型丙(付岩井小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「零戦62型(爆戦)」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F27: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter-bomber Model 62. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion
Quest.JP-Detail: 練度max「零戦21型(付岩本小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「零戦52型」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F29: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Zero Fighter Model 52. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 機種転換＆部隊再編
Quest.TR-Name: Model Conversion and Force Reorganisation
Quest.JP-Detail: 部隊を再編する！練度max「零戦52型甲(付岩本小隊)」搭載「瑞鶴」秘書艦で、「彩雲」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: F30: Equip Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Saiun. The Lv.7 Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight) must not be locked.

Quest.JP-Name: 新家具の準備
Quest.TR-Name: F31: Prepare the new furniture
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを9つ「廃棄」して、新家具の準備をします。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 9 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 新装備の準備
Quest.TR-Name: F32: Preparations for the New Equipment
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを5つ「廃棄」して、新装備配備の準備をします。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 5 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 上陸戦用新装備の調達
Quest.TR-Name: F33: Supply for the Landing Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で「7.7mm機銃」及び「12.7mm単装機銃」を二つずつ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap two 7.7mm Machine Gun and two 12.7mm Single Machine Gun Mount

Quest.JP-Name: 「熟練搭乗員」養成
Quest.TR-Name: F35q1: Skilled Crew Member Training
Quest.JP-Detail:
勲章x2消費：「鳳翔」秘書艦に練度max及び改修max「九六式艦戦」を搭載、熟練搭乗員を養成せよ！
(任務達成後、部隊は消滅します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Set Houshou as secretary and equip her with a Type 96 Fighter that is both rank 7 and ★max.

Quest.JP-Name: 対空機銃量産
Quest.TR-Name: F34w2: AA Gun Mass Production
Quest.JP-Detail: 「機銃」系装備を量産し、工廠で6個廃棄！ 「装備改修」強化をサポートせよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap six AA Guns.

Quest.JP-Name: 新型魚雷兵装の開発
Quest.TR-Name: F36: Development of a New Torpedo Armament
Quest.JP-Detail:
勲章x2消費：「島風」秘書艦に改修max「61cm五連装(酸素)魚雷」と
改修max「61cm三連装(酸素)魚雷」を装備！(任務達成後、各装備は消滅します)
Quest.TR-Detail:
Set Shimakaze as secretary and equip her with a ★max 61cm Quintuple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount
and a ★max 61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount.

Quest.JP-Name: 初夏の整理整頓
Quest.TR-Name: SF: Early Summer Cleanup
Quest.JP-Detail: 不要な装備を複数「廃棄」して、夏を迎える準備をしましょう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 5 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「航空基地設営」事前準備
Quest.TR-Name: F37: Preparation for Air Base Construction
Quest.JP-Detail: 「航空基地設営」の事前準備を開始する。「ドラム缶(輸送用)」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、「7.7mm機銃」及び「九六式艦戦」を各二つずつ用意せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Unlock two 7.7mm Machine Gun and two Type 96 Fighter. Then, scrap Drum (Transport) 2 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「陸攻」隊の増勢
Quest.TR-Name: F38: Expansion of Land-based Air Groups
Quest.JP-Detail:
「基地航空隊」開設に向け、「陸攻」の追加調達を行う。「7.7mm機銃」及び
「九九式艦爆」を各二つずつ準備せよ！(任務達成後、同装備は消滅します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Have two 7.7mm Machine Guns and two Type 99 Dive Bombers in your inventory. Unlock both equipment.

Quest.JP-Name: 主力「陸攻」の調達
Quest.TR-Name: F39q2: Supply of the Land-based Main Bomber Force
Quest.JP-Detail:
主力陸上攻撃機「一式陸攻」の新規調達を行う。「零式艦戦21型」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、
「九六式陸攻」一つと「九七式艦攻」二つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Have a Type 96 Attack Bomber and two Type 97 Torpedo Bombers in your inventory, and scrap two Zero Fighter Model 21. Unlock all of the equipment.

Quest.JP-Name: 「一式陸攻」性能向上型の調達
Quest.TR-Name: F40: Procurement of the Improved Type 1 Attack Bomber
Quest.JP-Detail:
「一式陸攻」性能向上型の配備を行う。「一式陸攻」一つと「天山」二つを準備せよ！
(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します/「一式陸攻」の熟練度は継承されます)
Quest.TR-Detail: Have Type 1 Attack Bomber and two Tenzan in your inventory. Unlock both equipment.

Quest.JP-Name: 「洋上補給」物資の調達
Quest.TR-Name: F41m3: Procurement of Underway Replenishment
Quest.JP-Detail:
「三式弾」一つを廃棄し、燃料750及び弾薬750と「ドラム缶(輸送用)」二つと「九一式徹甲弾」一つを
用意せよ！※任務達成後、用意した資源及び必要装備(徹甲弾は改修値の低いもの優先)は消滅します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 750 fuel, 750 ammo, two Drums, and one Type 91 Shell. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap one Type 3 Shell.

Quest.JP-Name: 「特注家具」の調達
Quest.TR-Name: Procurement of Custom-made Furniture
Quest.JP-Detail:
「25mm単装機銃」一つを廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「25mm連装機銃」及び「25mm三連装機銃」を各
二つ準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(改修値の低いもの優先)は消滅します。
Quest.TR-Detail: F42: Have 5000 furniture coin, two 25mm Twin Autocannon Mount, and two 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount in your inventory. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap one 25mm Single Autocannon Mount.

Quest.JP-Name: 中部海域「基地航空隊」展開！
Quest.TR-Name: F43: Launch the LBAS to the Central Ocean Area!
Quest.JP-Detail:
「ドラム缶(輸送用)」二つを廃棄、燃料1200及びボーキサイト3000、さらに「設営隊」一つを準備せよ！
※任務達成後、用意した資源及び「設営隊」は消滅します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 1200 fuel, 3000 bauxite, and a Construction Corps. And then, Scrap 2 drums.

Quest.JP-Name: 「特注家具」の調達
Quest.TR-Name: Procurement of Custom-made Furniture
Quest.JP-Detail: 「12.7cm連装高角砲」二つを廃棄し、家具コイン5,000と「14cm単装砲」及び「15.2cm単装砲」を各二つずつ準備せよ！ ※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修を優先)は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: F44: Have 5000 furniture coin, two 14cm Single Gun Mount, and two 15.2cm Single Gun Mount in your inventory. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap two 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount.

Quest.JP-Name: 新機軸偵察機の開発
Quest.TR-Name: F45: Develop the New Reconnaissance Plane
Quest.JP-Detail:
新機軸の偵察機の調達を行う。「零式水上偵察機」を二つ「工廠」で廃棄し、
「一式陸攻」一つと「彩雲」二つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消費します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Have one Type 1 Attack Bomber and two Saiun in your inventory. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap two Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane.

Quest.JP-Name: 噴式戦闘爆撃機の開発
Quest.TR-Name: F46: Develop the Jet Fighter-bomber
Quest.JP-Detail: ネ式エンジンを搭載した新型戦闘爆撃機の開発を行う。「紫電改二」三つを「工廠」で廃棄し、「新型航空機設計図」二つと「ネ式エンジン」一つを準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要アイテムは消費します)
Quest.TR-Detail: Have two New Aircraft Blueprint and one Ne-type Engine in your inventory. And then, scrap three Shiden Kai 2.

Quest.JP-Name: ネ式エンジンの増産
Quest.TR-Name: F47: Increase Production of Ne-type Engine
Quest.JP-Detail: 噴式航空機生産のため、ネ式エンジンの増産を行う。「零式艦戦52型」三つを「工廠」で廃棄し、「流星」「試製烈風 後期型」各二つと鉄鋼8,000を準備せよ！※任務達成後、用意した必要装備と資源は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 8000 steel, two Reppuu, and two Ryuusei in your inventory. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap three Zero Fighter Model 52.

Quest.JP-Name: 「特注家具」の調達
Quest.TR-Name: Procurement of Custom-made Furniture
Quest.JP-Detail:
主砲「12.7cm連装砲」を二つ廃棄、家具コイン5,000と「7.7mm機銃」及び「九六式艦戦」各二つずつ
準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: F48: Have 5000 furniture coins, two 7.7mm Machine Gun, and two Type 96 Fighter in your inventory. Unlock both equipment. And then, scrap two 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount.

Quest.JP-Name: 工廠稼働！次期作戦準備！
Quest.TR-Name: F90: Arsenal Work! Preparations for the Next Operation!
Quest.JP-Detail:
「14cm単装砲」x6廃棄、家具コイン6,000と「35.6cm連装砲」「九六式艦戦」各三つを
準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Prepare 6000 Furniture Coins, 3 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount, and 3 Type 96 Fighter in your inventory. Scrap 6 14cm Single Gun Mount.

Quest.JP-Name: 【丙】作戦「彩雲」調達＆輸送分解
Quest.TR-Name: Operation "Easy": Procurement, Disassemble and Transport "Saiun"
